name: Forest Crossroads
description:
Forest Crossroads: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey through mysterious forests, in which you will play the role of a brave traveler. Your task is to avoid all the traps and dangers, meeting a variety of strangers along the way, from a friendly farmer to a ghostly warrior, who will help you on your adventure. You need to find and destroy all the bandits in this forest in order to restore peace and justice, ensuring the safety of all residents.

You have to fight not only with little bandits, but also with stronger and more dangerous opponents who are hiding in the depths of the forest. During the game you will find several types of weapons, magic elixirs and gold that will help you increase your strength and not die.

The game is a 2D platformer. You need to destroy enemies and complete tasks in the location to advance through the story.
